path.name: Path
path.help: A local path on the server.

url.name: Path or URL
url.help:
URL of the model repo or local path on the server.
If needed, the model will be downloaded to the cache directory and quantized.
This location may also refer to model weights that have already been quantized.

passkey.name: Password, API Key, or Access Token

resource.help: The resource tag is for code, documents, media, or other assets that can be shared or composited.
